profile:
Smooth Ceiling Ltd
Smooth Ceiling specializes in removing stipple, other know as stucco/popcorn from your ceilings. 
Our team take pride in the work we do and we ourselves on making sure we get the job done right, and on your time schedule. Each area is covered and protected from floor to ceiling to ensure that dust does not seep through out the house. We specialize in turning your stucco ceiling to a smooth and perfect finish. 
We're dedicated to providing you the resources and services you need to modernize your home., 
We remove your outdated popcorn ceiling in a fast, clean and efficient manner.
Acoustic ceiling also known as the "popcorn ceiling" was in fashion over thirty years ago, but now new houses do not have these ceilings unless you request it prior to a new home being built.
Many home owners are also removing the stipple in their homes for benefits such as

Many benefits to the removal of Popcorn/Acoustic Ceilings:
	•	Brightens the room 
	•	Increase Re-sale Value
	•	Damage Control
        •	Modernizes the look      
	•	Less Dust and les Spider Webs
	•	Cleaner, Professional Look
	•	And much more…

Popcorn Ceiling Removal / Stucco Removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
service_area: Richmond Hill, Markham, Thornhill, Vaughn, Woodbridge, Toronto,  Stoufville, Kleinburg, Maple, KIng City. North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke
services: Popcorn ceiling removal / stucco removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
brands: Smooth Ceiling Ltd works with the highest quality of material such as  Benjamin Moore CGC plaster, Anchore protective Paper etc
specialities: We specialize in transforming your rough outdated ceiling into a  work of art.  We make sure that we meet your budget and time line. We protect your floors and walls from top to bottom to ensure that the dust does not seep into other rooms nor your furnace. We close off your vents and air intakes.  We use a wet method to remove the stucco "popcorn", then apply multiple coats of plaster to you're ceiling to insure the stability and longevity. We then use an LED to double check for any imperfections we might of missed. We feather sand the ceiling to a smooth finish and proceed by priming and painting the project with a top Benjamin Moore prime and paint. We finish the job by cleaning the work area and disposing the garbage.
name: Smooth Ceiling Ltd

profile:
COSMOPOLITAN CONSTRUCTION INC.
WINNER OF THE "BEST OF" HOMESTARS AWARDS 7 YEARS IN A ROW, AND COUNTING!

We specialize in EIFS Stucco & Cement Stucco, Interior & Exterior Renovations, Moulding, Repairing cracks, etc. 

Our focus is on providing you with stucco siding for a new home or a new addition, as well as replacing your house's existing siding. 

Whether your home's current siding is Plywood, Wood, Stucco, Brick, Metal, Wood Shingle or Vinyl -- we have you covered! 
And if you do not know what your siding's currently made of, we will visit your home and assess it ourselves.

It does not matter whether your home is one story, two stories or more!

We handle installing or completely replacing exterior trim, as well as repairing or partially replacing exterior trim. If there is evidence of water damage or rot on your existing trim, we will work on solving the issue!

Even if your exterior trim is made of Wood, Vinyl, Aluminum Wrap or Fiber Cement, we will take care of it. 

Our time is flexible and we will begin work on your project as soon as possible. We look forward to your newly stuccoed home or business just as much as you!

For more information or to book a FREE estimate, please CALL, TEXT, or EMAIL US:
(C) 905-399-5851
cosmo-construction@hotmail.com

_________________________________________________________

Information on STUCCO (EIFS): 

The EIFS Stucco process refers to the Exterior Insulation Finishing System, and it involves the following process:
- Application of a moisture barrier onto plywood
- Installation of Styrofoam (typically 1.5")
- Application of a base coat with fibreglass mesh onto the Styrofoam
- Application of a finish coat (colour and texture of your choice)

This same process is used for installing mouldings onto the outside of a house - which is usually applied around windows and doors. 

There is no maintenance requirement on the product once we are finished. It does not need to be resealed or painted. It remains intact and unchanged from its original look.

profile:
Why Choose House & Condo Painters?
 
Here at House & Condo Painters we are proud to say that we are one of the best Residential and Commercial Painting Contractors in Toronto. With over 25 years experience, we promise our clients to provide the highest quality painting and contracting services at highly competitive rates. We guarantee by the end of the project you will have an environment as unique as you!
 
To make this possible we offer to all clients:    
Outstanding Customer Service: Our staff are available to answer any and all of your questions. Your inquiries will be responded quickly, and regardless of your schedule!
 
Free In-Home Colour Consultations: House & Condo Painters specially provide free colour consultation before starting the job. We will give you our professional opinion on the colour and finish combinations that will make your home as you dream!
 
Following “Eco-Friendly” Processes: We only use high-quality trusted products to deliver the best results for your home. Often working with brands such as Benjamin Moore, Sherwin Williams, Behr, Dulux, Para, and more! We prioritize the use of paints with low VOCs to address any potential environmental concerns. Any leftover paint is saved for touch-ups, recycled  or donated to charity to minimize any unneeded waste.
 
Experienced Professionals: At House & Condo Painters we only hire professional, skilled painters for all of our projects. This helps us to ensure that the work we provide is of the highest quality and completed within the shortest amount of time.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
THE CEILING SPECIALISTS is a well established company that takes great pride in quality workmanship. We continue to improve in our methods of perfecting ceilings ,because every customers needs are different. We have perfected a dustless method to smooth out popcorn ceilings. This is extremely important for customers who have dust allergies. We have other various methods for popcorn stucco removal which can be tailor suited to the customers needs and wants. It can be a messy job that is why it is extremely important to keep up with the industry's standards and requirements.. We specialize in popcorn (acoustic) stucco removal. While removing the ceiling stucco is one aspect of the job, skim coating the ceiling with joint compound is the skilled trade needed to ensure smooth, flawless ceilings. At CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL we have highly qualified tradesmen who specialize in this department. We take the time to do it right the first time. POPCORN CEILING REMOVAL is a very visible upgrade, therefore a profitable one. It also serves as a breeding ground for spiders and dust mites. Removing your textured ceilings is a great investment. CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL also specializes in all ceiling related matters which include crown moldings, potlight installation, water damage ceilings, mold remediation etc. Our goal is to provide excellent customer service in all ceiling related matters. Furthermore we offer various packages to accommodate all customers financial budgets. If you need those popcorn ceilings gone, we have a package to meet your budget. All customers are given a detailed explanation of the job description, and are walked through the final phase to ensure 100% customer satisfaction. We require no deposits, and offer a 2 year warranty on all our work. We are just that confident in the quality of our workmanship!

CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL SPECIALISTS --- policies and standards

WE do not subcontract to other companies

We guarantee our jobs 100%.

NO deposits, 2 Year Warranty

Professionalism, On time and Experience is a prerequisite for all employees

Our motto is " If you are not 100% happy, you simply don't pay"

At THE CEILING SPECIALISTS we emphasize quality. We have many customers in our database that are willing to show off their ceilings to potential customers who are contemplating in getting their popcorn ceilings removed. These past customers do it willingly and with pleasure. The reason for this, is because at CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL we go the extra mile to make sure every customer is excited about their new ceilings. Happy is not good enough for us! 

Let THE CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL SPECIALISTS transform your out dated popcorn ceilings into smooth, modern masterpieces. 

Many benefits to the removal of Popcorn/Acoustic Ceilings:
•Painting is More Manageable
•Cleaner, Professional Look
•Damage Control
•Stain Control
•No Cracking Ceilings
•Increase Re-sale Value
•No Dust and Spider Webs
•Asbestos Removal
•And much more

Reasonable prices. Are we the cheapest?  Probably not.  But we are priced fairly. Anyone can offer really cheap prices, but then you get really cheap results that won't stand up over time. The fact of the matter is, we have had to fix some real messes for customers that were caused by others promoting themselves as drywall and texture experts.  So buyer beware: those bottom-feeder prices often turn out to be very expensive and time-consuming in the end.  You get what you pay for. 

OUR PROMISE TO YOU:

Always professional, high quality work,on time and  accompanied by great pricing!

Please call us at 647-741-5550. It will be our pleasure to come to your house and provide you with a written, detailed estimate at no cost. 

DOING IT RIGHT THE FIRST TIME!!!
service_area: Toronto, East York, Vaughan, Maple, Woodbridge, Klienburg, Nobleton, Etobicoke, Missisauga, Pickering, Ajax, Markham, North York, Aurora,
products: Accompanied with our popcorn ceiling stucco removal we use various products that are associated with BENJAMIN MOORE. Whether those products are paints and or primer sealers, we use the highest quality products to facilitate our stucco removal. Our protection material can range from foam rubberized padding to water resistant sheathing. Plastic can range from 3mm to 8mm depending on the need of protection. We use CGC for our joint plaster compound while adding certain eco-friendly solvents to the mix. This can only ensure a level 5 finish if applied by a highly qualified tradesman which CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL does provide. Our TITAN spray machines allow for an even distribution of eco- friendly solvents to the ceiling,eliminating overspray to areas not being treated. Reaching ceilings of25ft high is no match for CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL, as we supply all forms of scaffolding, to tackle the most difficult of jobs. All our tradesman tools are from the top reputable sources allowing for a finer job. The STUCCO REMOVERS have all the tools to get a 10star rating on any job
services:
CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL
POPCORN (ACOUSTIC) STUCCO REMOVAL
ALL TEXTURED CEILINGS MADE SMOOTH
CROWN MOULDINGS WITH INSTALLATION
POTLIGHTS (RECESSED LIGHTING) INSTALLATION
PAINTING
WATER DAMAGED CEILING REPAIRS
DRYWALL TAPING
COFFERED CEILINGS
brands: CEILING STUCCO REMOVAL only carries and works with the highest quality of brands in the field. These include BENJAMIN MOORE, SHERWIN WILLIAMS, CGC, MARSHALLTOWN, RICHARDS, SHEETROCK etc.
specialities: Transforming textured popcorn ceilings, into smooth, flawless masterpieces. Popcorn ceiling removal is our specialty. We take on the project from beginning to end. This includes protection of the premises, ceiling stucco removal, sanding and skim coating the ceilings as many times needed to ensure a level 5 finish( the smoothest level of plastering you can achieve). Priming the ceilings with a reputable sealer and painting them with Benjamin Moore Paint. Cleaning up to customers 100% satisfaction.
name: Ceiling Specialists: Popcorn Ceiling Removal

profile: Sky Stucco Systems Is a reliable installer of EIFS exterior stucco, architectural mouldings, foundation parging and repair in Toronto, GTA and all over Ontario. There are a variety of Stucco services in Mississauga but what set us apart is the quality, truest and exceptional customer satisfaction. As a Toronto stucco contractor, who is serving Mississauga, Milton, Markham, Oakville, Brampton and Toronto GTA we are willing and available to answer all your queries. We are happy and available to give you a free quotation for your next or current Exterior renovation or home repair project. Exterior stucco is a multi-layered EIFS that is used on both commercial buildings and homes. We do new installations and as well exterior stucco Repair. When we talk about Exterior Renovation, a very important part is to consider getting foundation repair or parging around the house and stucco walk out basement, especially over the years since the time the house is build. It can become soft and peeling off which cracks can appear, Parging and stucco that’s what we do. When we install exterior insulated finish system, it provides an extra R-Value to your home exterior renovation increasing the capabilities of superior energy efficiency and reduces moisture penetration. In the Toronto (GTA) community, energy efficiency is becoming an increasingly important social and economic requirement, and the EIFS systems can be an effective home energy-saving alternative and nearly maintenance-free.

profile:
We are Stucco, EIFS Contractor in the Ontario and surrounding area.

We specialize in EIFS Stucco & Cement Stucco, Interior & Exterior Renovations, Moulding, Repairing cracks, etc.
Our focus is on providing you with stucco siding for a new home or new addition, as well as replacing your house's existing siding.
Whether your home's current siding is Plywood, Wood, Stucco, Brick, Metal, Wood Shingle or Vinyl...we have you covered.
And if you do not know what your siding's currently made of, we will visit your home and assess it ourselves.

We handle installing or completely replacing exterior trim, as well as repairing or partially replacing exterior trim. If there is evidence of water damage or rot on your existing trim, we will work on solving the issue.
Even if your exterior trim is made of Wood, Vinyl, Aluminum Wrap or Fiber Cement, we will take care of it.
Our time is flexible and we will begin work on your project as soon as possible. We look forward to your newly stuccoed home or business just as much as you!
For more information or to book a free estimate, please call, text, or EMAIL US: 

647 5681509
info@ondeco.ca
https://www.ondeco.ca
products: All materials are high quality and produced by Durabond (www.durabond.com) We use ArtMouldings (http://www.artmoulding.com)
services: General Services: EIFS (Exterior Insulated Finished System), Decorative Mouldings, Stucco Repair, Traditional Stucco, Popcorn Ceiling Removal, Drywall Installation, Replacing Existing Siding, Siding for a New Home, Siding for a New Addition, Installing or Completely Replacing Exterior Trim, Repairing or Partially replacing Exterior Trim, Fixing Water Damaged or Rotting Exterior Trim
specialities: Stucco Repair, Traditional Stucco, Decorative Mouldings, EIFS Stucco, Stucco/Siding Replacement, Siding for a New Addition, Siding for a New Home, Installing or Completely Replacing Exterior Trim, Repairing or Partially Replacing Exterior Trim, Fixing Water Damaged or Rotting Existing Trim Siding for homes with one story, two stories, three stories or more. Replacing Siding for Homes with Plywood, Wood, Stucco, Brick, Metal, Wood Shingle, and Vinyl Replacing or Fixing Trims made of Wood, Vinyl Aluminum Wrap, Fibre Cement or Other EIFS refers to the Exterior Insulation Finishing System, and involves the following process: - Application of a moisture barrier onto plywood - Installation of Styrofoam (typically 1.5") - Application of a base coat with fibreglass mesh onto the Styrofoam - Application of a finish coat (colour and texture of your choice) This same process is used for installing mouldings onto the outside of a house
